author: fab_10
content: <@84562395988508672> <@131476523050860545> we are ready to include Besu to devnet-4, you can use this PR https://github.com/Inphi/eip4844-interop/pull/92 as reference for building a docker image and for the startup script

author: skylenet
content:
Perfect. I've added besu to devnet-4 in here: https://github.com/ethpandaops/4844-testnet/pull/64 

Btw, there's a permission issue on the besu docker image. We had the same problem with Teku. I've created a PR to fix it in here: https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/5092
